RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_MT_GENERIC_TASK_LAUNCHER *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_mt_generic_task_launcher.
PARAMETERS: p_class TYPE seoclsname OBLIGATORY, p_runid TYPE ygpl_mt_run=>td_process_id.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA o_cx TYPE REF TO cx_root. DATA o_task TYPE REF TO ygpl_mt_new_task. DATA err_msg TYPE string.
TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_task TYPE (p_class) EXPORTING run_id = p_runid. CATCH cx_root INTO o_cx. err_msg = o_cx->get_longtext( ). WRITE err_msg. MESSAGE err_msg TYPE 'E'. ENDTRY.
o_task->process_objects( ).
END-OF-SELECTION.
